channel.title: 混合app开发 on Astar Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 混合app开发 on Astar Blog

item.title: Flutter环境配置
item.description: 初始环境（临时变量） 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 git clone -b master https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git ./flutter/bin/flutter --version export PUB_HOSTED_URL=https://pub.flutter-io.cn export FLUTTER_STORAGE_BASE_URL=https://storage.flutter-io.cn export PATH=`pwd`/flutter/bin:$PATH 按照上述步骤操作时: 执行flutter doctor 会提示 -bash: fultter: command not found 执行 source ~/.bashr
